expo.name: DeepFly

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: DeepFly needs access to your photo library to analyze images and videos for potential deepfake manipulation.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: DeepFly needs camera access to capture photos for deepfake analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: DeepFly needs microphone access when recording videos for analysis.

plugins.photosPermission: DeepFly needs access to your photos for deepfake analysis.
plugins.cameraPermission: DeepFly needs camera access to capture photos for analysis.
DeepFly needs camera access to capture photos for deepfake analysis.

plugins.photosPermission: DeepFly needs access to your media library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: DeepFly needs permission to save reports.

expo.description: AI-powered deepfake detector. Analyze photos and videos for manipulation with on-device AI. 100% private - your media never leaves your phone.
